content.en: Hematology algorithm advancements: New algorithms are being used in hematology analyzers to improve accuracy and efficiency in performance evaluation. These algorithms are also being utilized to identify and enumerate nucleated red blood cells. In addition, algorithms are being developed to optimize manual blood smear review criteria and to calibrate flow rate and calculate absolute CD4+ T-cell counts.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for hæmatologialgoritmer: Nye algoritmer anvendes i hæmatologianalysatorer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten i præstationsvurderingen. Disse algoritmer bruges også til at identificere og tælle kernede røde blodlegemer. Derudover udvikles algoritmer til at optimere kriterierne for manuel blodudstrygningsgennemgang samt til at kalibrere flowrate og beregne absolutte CD4+ T-celle tællinger.
